description: The ARN of the IAM principal to remove from the pull time update exclusion list.

PrincipalArn.description: Principal arn that should not update image pull times.
PrincipalArn.markdownDescription:
Principal arn that should not update image pull times.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[a-z]+)*:iam::[0-9]{12}:(role|user)/[\w+=,.@-]+(/[\w+=,.@-]+)*$  
Update requires: No interruption
